text.div:
This code system https://mitw.dicom.org.tw/IG/TWCR/CodeSystem/clinical-other-staging-cll-codesystem defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
A Stage A： Hemoglobin≧10g/dL and Plateles≧100,000/mm3 and< 3 enlarged area
B Stage B： Hemoglobin≧10g/dL and Plateles≧100,000/mm3 and≧3 enlarged area
C Stage C： Hemoglobin<10g/dL and/or Plateles<100,000/mm3 and any number of enlarged area

name: ClinicalOtherStagingCLLCS
title: Clinical Other Staging - CLL Code System
description: Clinical Other Staging - CLL Code System
